privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: At ExploraPeru, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy describes how we collect, use and protect your information.
privacyPolicy.dataCollectionDescription: We collect personal data such as your name, email and phone number when you create an account or book a tour. We also collect information automatically, such as your IP address and browsing preferences.
privacyPolicy.yourRightsDescription: You have the right to access, correct or delete your personal data at any time. You can contact us to make these requests.
privacyPolicy.securityDescription: We take security measures to protect your information, including the use of technologies such as SSL to secure data transmission.
privacyPolicy.contactUsDescription: If you have questions about this privacy policy, feel free to contact us through our social networks.

termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
termsAndConditions.aboutUsDescription: We are ExploraPerú, a platform that allows certified tourism agencies to offer their tours, and users to book them. We act as intermediaries between the agencies and travelers.
termsAndConditions.scopeDescription: These terms and conditions apply to all users of ExploraPerú. By using our platform, you agree to abide by these terms.
termsAndConditions.servicesDescription: ExploraPerú does not organize tours. The services are provided by independent certified agencies.
termsAndConditions.paymentsDescription: Prices include applicable taxes. Payments are processed securely through our platform.
termsAndConditions.cancellationsDescription: Cancellations and changes are subject to the policies of the agency offering the tour.
termsAndConditions.privacyDescription: We respect your privacy and handle your data in accordance with our Policy of
termsAndConditions.contactDescription: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us via social media or email.

agenciesLanding.joinTitle: Join ExploraPerú and publish your tours
agenciesLanding.joinDescription: Register as an agency and start showcasing your tours to thousands of travelers worldwide.
agenciesLanding.activityPublication: Publishing your activity is free and simple.
agenciesLanding.activitiesDescription: Thousands of agencies trust us to showcase their tours.
agenciesLanding.reservationDescription: Full control over your bookings and customers.
agenciesLanding.trainingDescription: Receive constant training to improve your services.
agenciesLanding.communityDescription: Be part of a network of travel agencies.
agenciesLanding.supportDescription: Always available assistance to help you.
agenciesLanding.efficientDescription: Optimize your tasks with our tool.
agenciesLanding.personalizedSupportDescription: Get attention tailored to your specific needs.
agenciesLanding.testimonial2: The platform is amazing and easy to use.
agenciesLanding.testimonial3: Thanks to them, I have more visibility.
agenciesLanding.startNowDescription: Don’t wait any longer, sign up and start earning.
